messages.title: Vote Labour to get a Labour Government
Labour will deliver the change we need

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 1,000 more nurses in Scotland funded by a Mansion Tax on properties over £2m; introduce an immediate £100m Frontline Fund to target under-pressure A&E; and cut cancer waiting times.
Increase minimum wage, introduce an £8 minimum wage for over 18s on apprenticeships, and implement a Fair Pay policy that will see an £8 minimum wage and a living wage.
Bar the use of zero hour contracts that exploit the workers in this country.
Tackle tax avoidance, close loopholes, and legislate to recover the £1.1 billion lost to offshore trusts and other tax loopholes that cost the citizens of the UK billions every year.
Freeze energy bills until 2017 and give the regulator the power to cut bills.

issues.health: Recruit 1,000 more nurses in Scotland funded by a Mansion Tax on properties over £2m; introduce an immediate £100m Frontline Fund to target under-pressure A&E; and cut cancer waiting times.

contactInformation.address: 245 Low Waters Road, Hamilton, Lanarkshire. ML3 7YL
